articles.title: Apple's $19 Polishing Cloth supports so many devices, including the iPod Nano - CNET
articles.description: Commentary: Apple's cloth has a long compatibility list, but this is the definition of why you should shop around.
articles.content:
Apple's new $19 cloth is designed to clean anything from an iPod Nano up through Apple's Pro Display XDR.
Apple
